channel.title: Comments on: The main thing for the designer

item.title: By: admin
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/https://rwgrid.github.io/RidaWazneh/2020/01/26/the-main-thing-for-the-designer/#comment-9">Jack Morrison</a>.
I love the feel and sophistication of its superiority. I like people with a keen mind and at the same time easy to talk to.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Jack Morrison.

I love the feel and sophistication of its superiority. I like people with a keen mind and at the same time easy to talk to.

item.title: By: Jack Morrison
item.dc:creator: Jack Morrison
item.description: Think about the content that you want to invest in a created object, and only then will form. The thing is your spirit. A spirit unlike forms hard copy.
item.content:encoded: Think about the content that you want to invest in a created object, and only then will form. The thing is your spirit. A spirit unlike forms hard copy.

item.title: By: James Rodri
item.dc:creator: James Rodri
item.description: If it’s fast and cheap, it will never be good. If it’s cheap and good, it will never work out quickly. And if it is good and fast, it will never come cheap. But remember: of the three you still have to always choose two.
item.content:encoded: If it’s fast and cheap, it will never be good. If it’s cheap and good, it will never work out quickly. And if it is good and fast, it will never come cheap. But remember: of the three you still have to always choose two.
